Package tanks.weapons.projectiles

Class PhantomBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • tanks.weapons.projectiles.Projectile
      • tanks.weapons.projectiles.PhantomBullet
  • public class PhantomBullet
extends Projectile
    A class representing a PhantomBullet This is used to simulate shots for EnemyTanks

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhantomBullet

        public PhantomBullet​(double x,
                     double y,
                     double direction,
                     int levelSizeX,
                     int levelSizeY,
                     int delay,
                     int bounces,
                     Level level)
        Constructs a new PhantomBullet, Sets speed
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the PhantomBullet (top left)
        y - the y coordinate of the PhantomBullet (top left)
        direction - the direction the PhantomBullet is moving in
        levelSizeX - the x size of the Level
        levelSizeY - the y size of the Level
        delay - the delay between frames
        bounces - the number of bounces
        level - the Level that the PhantomBullet is in
